AboutSection.title: About me
AboutSection.paragraphOne: After graduating in Computer Science in 2014, I decided to continue learning and dedicate myself to my passion for programming. I decided to delve into the Javascript language and enrolled in several full-stack web programming courses to update and raise my level, where I could acquire knowledge about different frameworks and technologies, in addition to deepening in solving real and current problems.
AboutSection.paragraphTwo: My favorite part of programming is problem solving. I love the feeling of finding, or providing, a solution to a problem. My main stack is React, Next.js, Node.js, Typescript and Postgres. I am also familiar with Angular, MongoDB, Prisma among others. I'm always looking to learn new technologies.
AboutSection.paragraphThree: When I'm not programming, I like to play video games, watch movies, read and work out at the gym. I also skateboard, fish, and generally enjoy every moment in my life.
